Traditional French sponge cake. No preservatives, colourings or artificial flavourings. The Madeleine is a small shell-shaped sponge cake. A traditional favourite throughout France, the natural home-made taste brings back memories of baking in Grand-mere's French kitchen. Prepared using only the best ingredients; fresh eggs, fresh butter, milk chocolate, there are no preservatives, colourings or artificial flavourings. These fresh little cakes are a light buttery sponge and often served for breakfast with bowls of cafe au lait - try it! We know you will enjoy these traditional French cakes, so why not try others in our range. Bonne Maman Madeleine with Milk Chocolate. Bonne Maman Petit Coconut

Thick soft flatbreads, with a pronounced olive oil aroma and taste. Italian flatbreads made with extra virgin olive oil. 'These thick, soft flatbreads have a pronounced olive oil aroma and taste.'. Piada (or piadina as they are also called) are the typical flatbreads from Emilia Romagna. Traditionally they would have been made with lard but these ones are made with extra virgin olive oil which are becoming more popular as they are lighter and healthier. Throughout Emilia Romagna they are eaten as a snack both at home and also from specialised kiosks called Piadinerie where they are served hot and folded in half to be eaten on the go.

Made with Puglian olive oil and seasoned with oregano. From a small local bakery in Puglia. A soft golden focaccia made with durum wheat and seasoned with Puglian Olive Oil and Oregano. Focaccia Pugliese is the traditional round focaccia from Puglia. The golden colour comes from the durum wheat and theirregular holes in the top are made by hand which allow the fruity Puglian olive oil to seep into the bread. Our Focaccia Pugliese is made using the traditional recipe and finest flour ground in the mills of Altamura.

'These thin, soft flatbreads have a delicate olive oil aroma and wholemeal taste.'. Piada (or piadina as they are also called) are the typical flatbreads from Emilia Romagna. Traditionally they would have been made with lard but these ones are made with extra virgin olive oil which are becoming more popular as they are lighter and healthier. Throughout Emilia Romagna they are eaten as a snack both at home and also from specialised kiosks called Piadinerie where they are served hot and folded in half to be eaten on the go. Recipe Ideas. Top with sliced figs, prosciutto ham and salad leaves and fold in half. For a sweet treat spread with a layer of chocolate spread and sliced banana. Regional breads from Italian bakers. product.productName: Hovis granary malted brown medium sliced bread -
product.productDescription: Great taste more naturally. Source of fibre. Low fat and sugars. No artificial preservatives. Suitable for vegetarians&vegans. Why should I buy Hovis Granary ..........? Granary Malted brown bread is made using malted flakes of wheat. It is a unique proposition in bread, combining historical values and traditional processing techniques, with modern day consumer values. . Hovis Granary bread has a distinctive nutty flavour&texture and it is also a good source of fibre. The exact Granary flour formula is a closely guarded secret but the magic ingredient which gives Granary branded products their unmistakable rich, nutty taste is the malting of wheat over a traditional ten day period. At Hovis, we believe that natural is best, which is why we promise never to use artificial preservatives. This means you get all the great tasting, freshness you expect from Hovis- just more naturally. Hovis - great taste more naturally. If you enjoy the great taste of Hovis Granary, why not try our delicious Hovis 7 Seeds loaf? To help you enjoy your Hovis loaf even more, why not be inspired by some exciting recipe ideas? Visit us at www.hovisbakery.co.uk to find out more.

Light, buttery and deliciously flaky, our croissants are the next best thing to having a real French boulangerie on your doorstep. They’re prepared in France, with fine-textured French flour and extra generous quantities of creamy AOC Charentes butter, which together create the light, flaky layers and rich flavour that make them so irresistibly moreish (and just like the best boulangeries, we don’t use any artificial colourings or preservatives). product.productDescription: Organic. Made without wheat . No added baker's yeast. Baked using renewable energy. No additives or preservatives. Suitable for vegetarians. Organic rye. Rossisky - A deliciously and tangy. Russian-inspired rye bread. Try Rye. More than 80% agree rye leaves you less bloated... fuller for longer and more energetic*. *Organically produced. Good bread, good taste... simple. There's a very good reason why our bread is tastier than most... from grain to loaf, we refuse to cut corners. We start with the best natural ingredients, add a little water, and let our doughs rise slowly (because, as any baker worth their dough will tell you, time equals flavour). The product of all this patience is bread with a unique rounded taste. So if you want wholesome, natural bread made with nothing more than time, patience and an uncompromising attention to detail, trust The Village Bakery. Artisan breads from The Village Bakery - good bread, good taste... simple. The Village Bakery. Try rye challenge is association with Woman&Home magazine. Then they’re quickly frozen, and baked here in the UK, so they’re always beautifully fresh. Warmed in the oven and served with a cup of good coffee, they’re an indulgent breakfast treat.

product.productName: Hovis seed sensations original seven seeds -

Multiseeded bread with brown linseed, roasted sunflower, pumpkin, sunflower, poppy, millet&golden linseed. Why should I buy Hovis 7 seeds original ..........? Seeds are the building blocks that contain the nutrients needed to nourish the growth of a new plant. Most seeds provide iron, zinc, fibre and protein. Our Hovis 7 Seed bread uses 7 different varieties of seeds to give you a great tasting loaf. At Hovis, we believe that natural is best, which is why we promise never to use artificial preservatives. This means you get all the great tasting, freshness you expect from Hovis- just more naturally. Hovis - great taste more naturally. If you enjoy the great taste of Hovis 7 Seeds, why not try our delicious Hovis Granary loaf? To help you enjoy your Hovis loaf even more, why not be inspired by some exciting recipe ideas? Visit us at www.hovisbakery.co.uk to find out more.

product.productName: Cuckoo Cupcakes Banana & Vanilla and Beetroot & Chocolate -
product.productDescription: Suitable for vegetarians. House of Cuckoo likes to do things differently. We provide an alternative to the sugar-laden sweet treat shelves by using fruit and vegetable purées in our tasty creations. Supporting local suppliers means fresher ingredients and a healthier community, so we try to make sure that everything we use has travelled the shortest distance possible. We use as few ingredients as we can. We don't like to complicate our products with artificial flavours, or fill them with controversial chemicals and preservatives. And we don't use anything we can't spell. That way we know what's going into our products and you know what's going into your bodies. House of Cuckoo. The Quirky Kitchen.

product.productName: The Food Doctor multi-seed & cereal wraps -
product.productDescription: 116 calories per wrap. High fibre. Protein source. Low in sat fat. Naturally nutritious. Suitable for vegetarians&vegans. Fibre-rich wraps crammed with delicious seeds and cereals make a wholesome base to enjoy anytime. How to enjoy: Wraps are a perfect way to enjoy a host of nutritious fillings. Start with mixed lettuce leaves, add chopped tomato and cucumber, but then don't forget your protein. Lean chicken, poached salmon or crayfish are perfect, or if you want to go vegetarian, choose houmous or cottage cheese. Spice up with some sliced peppers and chilli, mixed with natural yoghurt and fresh herbs - roll up and enjoy, truly delicious! . Eat better forever. Join the conversation on healthy eating. Twitter@FoodDoctorUK. Facebook@FoodDoctorUK
